content: this crochet haunted house pillow may look spooky but it brings nothing but charm to your home stitched in red heart super saver this is a great small project for practicing half_double_crochet single_crochet assembly slip_stitch color changes double_crochet french knot surface slip_stitch and more you can use it as an accent pillow or layer it with bigger pillows for visual interest either way it adds a splash of color or texture to your halloween display red heart super saver 7 oz/198 g 364 yds /333 m contrast a pale plum 0579 1 ball contrast b charcoal 3950 1 ball contrast c carrot 0256 1 ball contrast d aran 0313 1 ball size 16 high x 14 wide x 3 deep / 40 5cm high x 35 5cm wide x 7 5cm deep
